column3:
select * from employees
order by salary desc;

SELECT 
    e.Employee_Name,
    d.Department_Name
FROM Employees e
JOIN Departments d
    ON e.Department_ID = d.Department_ID;

SELECT 
    d.Department_Name,
    COUNT(e.Employee_ID) AS EmployeeCount
FROM Departments d
LEFT JOIN Employees e
    ON d.Department_ID = e.Department_ID
GROUP BY d.Department_Name;
